text: ane musa (a.Sa.)Ni kaume te'ona pachi potana gharenamo (manthi banavela) eka vacharadane pujya banavi didhum, jemam eka avajani gothavana hati, sum te'o'e a na joyum ke te temani sathe vata na hatum karatum ane na to te'one ko'i marga batavatum hatum, tene te'o'e pujya banavi didhum ane ghanum an'yayi krtya karyum
